actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for assistance to certain owners of property damaged by floodwaters at the Galveston Bay project at Baytown, Texas.

summary.text: Modifies the Galveston Bay, Texas, flood protection project to provide for payments and benefits to the owners of property rendered uninhabitable by flood water.

titles.title: A bill to provide for assistance to certain owners of property damaged by floodwaters at the Galveston Bay project at Baytown, Texas.
